document.full_text: baseball's home run king admitted to using steroids and even complained about the pain from receiving injections, an old friend of barry bonds testified in the tarnished star's perjury trial on wednesday.
document.title: steroid shots were pain in barry bonds' butt: witness
lines_and_colors: baseball's home run king admitted to using steroids and even complained about the pain from receiving injections, an old friend of barry bonds testified in the tarnished star's perjury trial on wednesday.
